problems.title: Group Anagrams
problems.description:
Problem Statement

Given an array of strings, group the anagrams together.
You can return the answer in any order.

Return a list of groups, where each group is a list of strings.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
6
eat tea tan ate nat bat

Sample Output
bat
nat tan
ate eat tea

Explanation:
The groups are ["bat"], ["nat", "tan"], ["ate", "eat", "tea"].

Sample Input
1


Sample Output
problems.constraints:
1 <= strs.length <= 10^4
0 <= strs[i].length <= 100
strs[i] consists of lowercase English letters.

testCases.input:
6
eat tea tan ate nat bat
testCases.expectedOutput:
bat
nat tan
ate eat tea

hintsList: Map each string to a key representing its character count.
Strings with the same key are anagrams.
